Projet de developpement rural du Nord -
            est - Zaire

abstracts.cdata!:
The Project would be a continuation of
            the IDA-financed Ituri livestock Project (Credit 697-ZR).
            Its main objectives would be to increase livestock and
            foodcrop production and strengthen rural development
            institutions through the provision of: (i) veterinary and
            animal production services and infrastructure; (ii) crop
            development services and inputs; (iii) human health
            services; (iv) basic data, monitoring and evaluation; (v)
            studies, pilot activities, trials and training; (vi)
            selective maintenance of transport infrastructure; and (vii)
            technical assistance. The Project would improve the revenues
            of about 120,000 low-income farmers. It would increase
            substantially production of livestock, beans, maize, sweet
            potatoes, cassava and groundnuts.
